long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This addon makes it so you can click anywhere on the left side of a comment to minimize it.

V0.7 - Added support for np.reddit and fixed some bugs
V0.6.1 - Minor fix
V0.6 - Added preview
V0.5.1 - Fixed bug with night mode
V0.5 - Rewrote core functionality
V0.4 - Added thickness slider and fixed autoscroll functionality
V0.3 - Added collabsed color
V0.2.5 - Autoscroll smoothed out
V0.2.4 - Edge case bug fix
V0.2.3 - Fixed options menu
V0.2.2 - Minor bug fix
V0.2.1 - Minor bug fix
V0.2 - Autoscroll added
